titleStmt.title: The refuter refuted. Or Doctor Hammond's Ektenesteron defended, against the impertinent cavils of Mr. Henry Jeanes, minister of Gods Word at Chedzoy in Somerset-shire. By William Creed B.D. and rector of East-Codford in Wiltshire.
titleStmt.author: Creed, William, 1614 or 15-1663.

titleStmt.title: The refuter refuted. Or Doctor Hammond's Ektenesteron defended, against the impertinent cavils of Mr. Henry Jeanes, minister of Gods Word at Chedzoy in Somerset-shire. By William Creed B.D. and rector of East-Codford in Wiltshire.
titleStmt.author: Creed, William, 1614 or 15-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Royston, and are to be sold at the Angel in Ivy-lane,

notesStmt.note: In response to: Jeanes, Henry. Doctor Hammond his Ektenesteron, or a greater ardency in Christ's love of God at one time.
Part of title transliterated from Greek characters.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nouemb 9th 1659"; the second 6 in imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
